element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates isolines from a raster layer containing a continuous variable

element.name: DISTANCE
element.text: Differnece between values represented by two contiguous isolines.

element.name: MIN
element.text: Minimum value for isoline creation. In areas with values lower than this, isolines will not be created

element.name: MAX
element.text: Maximum value for isoline creation. In areas with values greater than this, isolines will not be created

image.description: Contour lines vector layer from a MDE, with an equidistance of 50 meters.
